content.html:
About Us

Semrush is a leading online visibility management and content marketing SaaS platform

Who are we?

From small businesses to global enterprises, Semrush is the go-to platform for managing online visibility and accelerating digital growth.

Semrush enables businesses globally to run search engine optimization, pay-per-click, content, social media and competitive research campaigns and get measurable results from online marketing.

Semrush allows customers to understand trends, uncover insights, and generate compelling content to improve the reach and effectiveness of their websites and social media pages.

Our mission

Make online marketing easy and accessible for all. Every business can grow with Semrush.
The best marketers enjoy and love what they do. Semrush enables marketing professionals to flex their creativity and run effective campaigns because we help them understand trends, derive unique and actionable insights, and optimize highly relevant content for their customers.

Trusted by the world’s leading brands

Semrush evolution

From day one, we've invested heavily in R&D to build tools, software and data assets to transform a single point solution into an all-in-one platform that up levels marketers all over the world.
Over the years, we've invented, improved, and expanded an award-winning suite of products to empower entrepreneurs, marketers, SMBs, and enterprises to grow their online visibility, expand their reach, and outshine their competition.
20
08Semrush was founded.
Single tool developed for private use.
09Pilot product launched with three employees.
12Semush registered as a U.S. company. First U.S. office opened in Trevose, Pennsylvania.
4 tools comprised the Semrush platform.
13Marketing department established—before this, growth was driven by word of mouth.
148 tools comprised the Semrush platform.
15Expansion to the EU:
Offices opened in Prague and Limassol.
1621 tools comprised the Semrush platform.
1727 tools in the Semrush platform. Semrush Academy launched, providing online courses, expert training, and digital marketing certifications.
18Boston HQ established,
followed by a third U.S. office.
20Acquired Prowly, the company expands to Poland. 55+ tools comprised the Semrush platform.
21Semrush listed publicly on NYSE. Semrush App Center launched, enabling third-party app integration.
22Major geographical expansion: Offices opened in Amsterdam, Barcelona, Berlin, Belgrade, Yerevan, and Austin. Acquired Backlinko and Kompyte.
23Milestones reached: 100,000 paying customers and 1,000,000 free registered active users. Acquired Traffic Think Tank.
25+ new apps in the App Center.
24Opened a new office in Florida. Acquired Ryte, Exploding Topics and took a majority stake in Brand24.
16
years of experience
10M
users have already tried Semrush
156
countries served
13
offices worldwide

2008

Semrush was founded. Single tool developed for private use.

2009

Pilot product launched with three employees.

2012

Semush registered as a U.S. company. First U.S. office opened in Trevose, Pennsylvania. 4 tools comprised the Semrush platform.

2013

Marketing department established—before this, growth was driven by word of mouth.

2014

8 tools comprised the Semrush platform.

2015

Expansion to the EU: Offices opened in Prague and Limassol.

2016

21 tools comprised the Semrush platform.

2017

27 tools in the Semrush platform. Semrush Academy launched, providing online courses, expert training, and digital marketing certifications.

2018

Boston HQ established, followed by a third U.S. office.

2020

Acquired Prowly, the company expands to Poland. 55+ tools comprised the Semrush platform.

2021

Semrush listed publicly on NYSE. Semrush App Center launched, enabling third-party app integration.

2022

Major geographical expansion: Offices opened in Amsterdam, Barcelona, Berlin, Belgrade, Yerevan, and Austin. Acquired Backlinko and Kompyte.

2023

Milestones reached: 100,000 paying customers and 1,000,000 free registered active users. Acquired Traffic Think Tank. 25+ new apps in the App Center.

Empowering the digital journey

At Semrush, we believe that powerful digital marketing tools should be accessible to everyone, and we also offer some tailored features for different types of users.
For Enterprises
Semrush’s Enterprise SEO Solution is designed for the most demanding clients and companies who need best-in-class tools to enhance their digital marketing operations. Automated workflows and powerful AI boosts productivity by ten times and unifies SEO operations across disparate teams, industries, and regions.
Visit page →
For Entrepreneurs and SMBs
Individuals and small to medium-sized businesses need to elevate their online visibility to stand out in an increasingly competitive environment. Semrush offers powerful, yet easy-to-use tools to make world-class marketing simple and effective.
Visit page →
For Agencies
Semrush is the go-to platform for agencies managing multiple client campaigns. Our comprehensive toolkit allows you to seamlessly execute and optimize campaigns across various digital channels, ensuring you deliver exceptional results for every client, every time.
Visit page →

Our Impact

Pastreez: "Macaroons Near Me"

Learn how a family bakery crafted an SEO recipe to get the #1 spot for an extra sweet keyword and whipped up 55% of sales from non-brand organic traffic.

Sam the (Local) Concrete Man Knows SEO

From Spokane to Pittsburgh Sam put 100 nationwide franchises on the map with Google's local map pack.

BetterVet Lead the Organic Pet Pack

With 1900 keywords at #1 and a 2,000% increase in organic traffic, this mobile vet clinic deserves a 5-paw review.

Semrush News

Search Engine Land to Expand Educational Offerings After Being Acquired by Semrush

Digital marketing publisher Third Door Media acquired by Semrush; brands include Search Engine Land, MarTech, SMX, and Digital Marketing Depot

October 16, 2024

Video SEO Builder Now Available in the Semrush App Center

Videos are becoming a larger part of search, as people often prefer watching videos to find answers to their queries. 

October 10, 2024

Semrush Holdings, Inc. to Host Analyst Day on Tuesday, October 1st, 2024

Semrush Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: SEMR), a leading online visibility management SaaS platform, will host an Analyst Day in New York City on Tuesday, October 1st, 2024. Semrush’s executive management team will discuss the strategic vision and long-term outlook for the company...

September 16, 2024

Talent

If you're passionate about digital marketing and you're ready to make an impact, explore our career opportunities.

Join Our Team

Investors

As a publicly traded company (NYSE:SEMR), Semrush is committed to delivering long term value for our shareholders.

Investor Relations

Media

Whether you’re looking for expert commentary, search trends, or data to support your story, we’re here to help.

Contact Us
